comments.body: here we are testing something that can't pass analysis, just to make sure the optimizer rule is robust.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +44,48 @@    val input = LocalRelation('a.array(ArrayType(IntegerType, true)))
    val attr = input.output.head
    val plan = input.select(attr.cast(ArrayType(IntegerType, false)).as("casted"))
    val optimized = Optimize.execute(plan)
    // Though cast from `ArrayType(IntegerType, true)` to `ArrayType(IntegerType, false)` is not
